text: To evaluate whether poly ( I : C ) injection caused hepatitis in CN2 - 29 ( + / 2 ) / MxCre ( 2 / 2 ) mice , we examined serum ALT levels and liver histology following poly ( I : C ) injection . We found that , following poly ( I : C ) injection , serum ALT levels in CN2 - 29 ( + / 2 ) / MxCre ( 2 / 2 ) mice increased , reached a peak one day after injection , declined from day 1 to day 6 , and were not elevated thereafter ; this time - course indicated that poly ( I : C ) injection alone did not induced continuous liver injury ( figure S6 ) . Based on these findings , we believe that the effects of poly ( I : C ) injection in these mice did not confound our analysis of chronic hepatitis .
